name: CreateCustomerProfile
description:
Create a new customer profile in the Entrata system.

Use this tool to add a new customer profile to the Entrata database for a specific organization. Useful for handling customer onboarding processes.

parameters.name: client_subdomain
parameters.description: The unique subdomain of the client organization in the Entrata system.

parameters.name: customer_payment_info
parameters.description: A JSON array containing AR payment-related information for the customer profile creation.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Entrata API
